snippet: Two former executives of a defunct New York broker-dealer were indicted Monday as part of a widening U.S. investigation into foreign bribery involving their employer and Venezuelan state economic development banks....

headline.print_headline: Two NY Broker-Dealer Executives Charged in Venezuelan Bribery Case
headline.main: Two NY Broker-Dealer Executives Charged in Venezuelan Bribery Case

lead_paragraph: Two former executives of a defunct New York broker-dealer were indicted Monday as part of a widening U.S. investigation into foreign bribery involving their employer and Venezuelan state economic development banks.
